item.title: Glee, built with FlightJS
item.description: I think it’s a good practice to write three things you are grateful for every day. It keeps you focus on the positive. I have this idea from this TED talk. I did it for more than a month some time ago and I’m now restarting this habit. It happened that I’ve received a small notebook as a freebie form some event just before starting this habit thus I was OK with writing three things I was grateful for every day on paper.
